d:
Taylor Wilkinson is a fairly normal guy – but fairly unfortunate, after being made redundant from his first job out of college. Still, his severance package was enough to buy a second-hand virtual reality headset… how was he to know that it would transform him into the previous owner?

Read the full story at: https://www.hentai-foundry.com/stories/user/JoeForest/69944/Total-Immersion-Edge-Case or https://archiveofourown.org/works/53995897

Support the artist at https://subscribestar.adult/joeforest
